isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Luggage Compartment Lights With 48 And 60 Inch Box Sleeper

svcproc.title: Luggage Compartment Lights With 48 And 60 Inch Box Sleeper
svcproc.para: When the right luggage light switch is closed, power flows from battery stud (B2) through circuit 14AP, fuse F8-D, circuits14AX, 14P, 14N, fuse L2 and circuit 63AE to the right luggage compartment light switch and lamp. If the left luggage light switch is also closed, power will also flows through circuit 14N, fuse L1, and circuit 63AA to the left luggage compartment light switch and lamp. The ground path for the right light is 11V and the ground path for the left light is 11F.
